mod.name: vexMod
mod.credits: Slay the Spire Discord: Ideas, assistance, other help. Spleeninator, Lyman: Relic and enemy art. Raz: VFX "inspiration". Rincewind: ZHS translation.

cards.name: Virus
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand.

cards.name: Tweet Strike
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, @DBotling tweets about it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tweet Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 19 damage.
If this kills a non-minion enemy, @DBotling tweets about it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Antique Fury
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of Relics you have.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Antique Fury+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of Relics you have.

cards.name: Spire Strike
cards.description:
Costs 1 more for each Act cleared.
Deal damage equal to your floor number.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spire Strike+
cards.description:
Costs 1 more for each Act cleared.
Deal damage equal to your floor number.

cards.name: Fear
cards.description:
Ethereal.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable.

relics.name: Backup Battery
relics.description: If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: Conserve energy! Shut off Orb slots when you're not using them.

relics.name: Happy Drink
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 2. Whenever you enter a shop, increase your Max HP by 2.
relics.flavorText: The shop offers free refills.

relics.name: Last Will
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 111 Gold.
When you die or win, @DBotling tweets about your run.
relics.flavorText: Your possessions are bequeathed to The Merchant.

relics.name: Mediocre Mixtape
relics.description: At the start of each combat, perform a random bard:Melody.
relics.flavorText: Sounds familiar.

relics.name: Memory Locket
relics.description: At the end of your first turn, Retain your hand.
relics.flavorText: If you squeeze it hard enough you can remember the open beta.

relics.name: Pain Converter
relics.description: Whenever you receive 10 or more unblocked attack damage, draw 1 additional card and gain [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: This machine seems to be magnetically attracted to your exposed injuries.

relics.name: Rainbow Shades
relics.description: The first time you draw an Ethereal card each combat, put a copy of it on top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Lookin' to the sky in style.

relics.name: Relic Launcher
relics.description: At the start of each combat, deal damage to a random enemy equal to the number of Relics you have.
relics.flavorText: Mostly an excuse to use the FX.

relics.name: Right Greave
relics.description: If you have 25% or less HP at the start of your turn, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: STILL waiting for Left Greave.

relics.name: Singing Flower
relics.description: Every 3 turns, bard:Queue a [BuffNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].
relics.flavorText: It's, like, in tune with the planet's energy, dude!

relics.name: Spotlight
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 3 Starlit to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Light 'em up!

relics.name: Berry Bomb
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 6. In 8 combats, explodes and deals 100 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Tastes explosive!

relics.name: Better-O-Tron
relics.description: The next 3 unupgraded cards you add into your deck are upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Mechanical device certain to improve your life somehow!

relics.name: Bottled Tune
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a bard:Note. At the start of each combat, bard:Queue that bard:Note.
relics.flavorText: You crack the lid and hear a faint sound.

relics.name: Consolation Prize
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain that much Gold at the end of combat.
relics.flavorText: Gold oozes from your wounds.

relics.name: Dragon Fruit
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 5. At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack played this turn.
relics.flavorText: As a connoisseur would say, piquant.

relics.name: Dusty Game Cartridge
relics.description: Whenever you draw a card during your turn, gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: It's unclear which system the game was meant for.

relics.name: Focus Sash
relics.description: When you would die while you have at least 10 HP, heal to 1 HP instead.
relics.flavorText: It's super effective!

relics.name: Galaxy Diorama
relics.description: The additional effects of your Solar and Lunar cards are always active.
relics.flavorText: Wholly innacurate.

relics.name: Polyform Stone
relics.description: Right click to stop.
relics.flavorText: What the fuck!?

relics.name: Randomized Relic
relics.description: Has different qualities every time you find it.
relics.flavorText: Different every time!

relics.name: Skull Hunter
relics.description: Elites drop an additional Rare card reward.
relics.flavorText: You're bringing this conflict to a head.

relics.name: Throwing Star
relics.description: Every time you play or Exhaust 3 Stars in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Unorthodox use for the stars, but it's OK.

relics.name: Wand of Magic Missile
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, deal 2-5 damage to a random enemy 3 times.
relics.flavorText: The end of this magic wand glows.

relics.name: Writhing Mask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 3 Malleable.
relics.flavorText: It squirms on your face uncomfortably.

relics.name: Audience Doll
relics.description: Whenever you perform a bard:Melody, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Always there to listen and offer support!

relics.name: Box of Bandaids
relics.description: Whenever you add a card into your deck, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: Vends only when shown cool techniques.

relics.name: Fake Star
relics.description: The first Stellar card you play each combat will be active.
relics.flavorText: But if you squint it looks pretty real!

relics.name: Gilded Clover
relics.description: ALL future cards you find are Rare.
relics.flavorText: Super-duper rare!

relics.name: Gravitational Rainbow
relics.description: At the start of every odd-numbered turn, put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: "But rainbows aren't affected by gravity!" you say. Well, pah!

relics.name: Invisible Cloak
relics.description: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: You're far too modest to "wear" this.

relics.name: Plasma Pancake
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 6.
At the start of each combat, deal 11 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It's literally on fire.

relics.name: Retaliation Kit
relics.description: The first time your Block is broken each combat, apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: All you need to disappear in a burst of smoke! Smoke no longer included.

relics.name: Rose Stone
relics.description:
Glows sometime.
Right click while glowing for a massive reward.
relics.flavorText: Watch for thorns.

relics.name: Timesight Glass
relics.description: At the start of every even-numbered turn, put a random card from your discard pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: You can see yourself a few minutes before.

relics.name: Warped Instrument
relics.description: Every 10th bard:Note you bard:Queue is a [WildNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].
relics.flavorText: This twisted bunch of tubes never quite sounds the same.

relics.name: Dootinator
relics.description: Whenever you bard:Queue a bard:Note, doot.
relics.flavorText: Previously owned by a skeleton.

relics.name: Energy Relic
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] in real life.
relics.flavorText: What do you mean you're still tired?

relics.name: Grifter Satchel
relics.description: All combats drop an additional Colorless card reward.
relics.flavorText: Used for many a not-so-good deed.

relics.name: Juggling Balls
relics.description: Everything bounces.
relics.flavorText: Made of rubber.

relics.name: Mini Solar System
relics.description: Relics now orbit you.
relics.flavorText: Something we all revolve around.

relics.name: Ne donne pas d'énergie
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Energy.
relics.flavorText: The images are looking awfully treacherous today.

relics.name: News Ticker
relics.description: Right click once per combat to see the latest Tweet by @DBotling.
relics.flavorText: Keep up with the latest and greatest of the Spire!

relics.name: Pepega.
relics.description: Really dude? That was just Pepega.
relics.flavorText: That's just Pepega.

relics.name: Place Exchanger
relics.description: Right click: Exchange places with an enemy. Activate once per combat.
relics.flavorText: Works exactly as written!

relics.name: Pop. Tire
relics.description:
Bounces.
High Score: 0
relics.flavorText: DEFEAT THE INFIDELS

relics.name: Rainbarrow
relics.description: Your targeting arrow is colorful.
relics.flavorText: Sparkly!

relics.name: Realism Engine
relics.description: Whenever you drink a potion, burp.
relics.flavorText: Now it all feels immersive.

relics.name: Spire Shuffle
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, move to the right. Whenever you play a Skill, move to the left.
relics.flavorText: To the left! To the right! Woo-hoo!

relics.name: Story Book
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, the Story grows.

relics.name: Voice Box
relics.description: You can talk now.
relics.flavorText: You feel badly written.

relics.name: Wave Stone
relics.description: Your relics do the Wave.
relics.flavorText: So entrancing to look at.

relics.name: bottle
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card.
relics.flavorText: bottle

relics.name: Adventure Map
relics.description: ALL ? rooms contain events.
relics.flavorText: The real treasure was the friends we made along the way.

relics.name: Auto Tuner
relics.description: At the start of your turn, perform a random bard:Melody.
relics.flavorText: Sure, it sounds strange, but it's technically tuned!

relics.name: Big Berry
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 30.
relics.flavorText: You had no idea they could get this big.

relics.name: Bot Bait
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Every 6 turns, a Mini-Bot joins battle.
relics.flavorText: Found in some mediocre Factory.

relics.name: Clock Rock
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, set your run timer to -10 minutes. At the end of combat, rewind your run timer by 45 seconds. When your run timer hits 0, you lose.
relics.flavorText: Tick tock goes the clock rock.

relics.name: Cursed Compass
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future maps contain only 1 path.
relics.flavorText: No matter which way you turn, it always points forwards...

relics.name: Cyborg Telescope
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Orb slots. Whenever you play a Star, Channel 1 Lightning.
relics.flavorText: You realize now that every electric volt is a tiny star too.

relics.name: Devious Botling
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Torments you every 3rd turn and in other ways. Insults you on Twitter when you die.
relics.flavorText: A tiny little mini-bot whose prime directive is to mess with people. Twitter at @DBotling.

relics.name: Endless Sickness
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, shuffle a Virus into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Always multiplying.

relics.name: Horrorstone
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, obtain 666 Gold and a random Blight.
relics.flavorText: Holding it fills you with terror. Your drop it, but it writhes back into your pocket.

relics.name: Improvement Manual
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 5 cards.
relics.flavorText: Ahh, so THAT's how you make a card Innate!

relics.name: Lich's Phylactery
relics.description: Prevent ALL HP loss. For every 10 damage prevented, remove a random card from your deck. When your deck has no cards, you lose.
relics.flavorText: It feels cold in your hands, no matter what you do...

relics.name: Mall Pass
relics.description:
ALL ? rooms contain The Merchant. Whenever you encounter The Merchant, gain 50 Gold.
You cannot remove cards at The Merchant.
relics.flavorText: Now you can get the great discounts!

relics.name: Mind Devourer
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of combat, remove a random card from your deck.
relics.flavorText: Mm, shiny! Wait, what was your name again?

relics.name: Mystery Boss Challenge
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose Energy or Non-Energy and obtain a random boss relic of that type.
relics.flavorText: It's fucking raw!

relics.name: New, Clear Reactor
relics.description: Energy is conserved between turns and combats. You no longer gain Energy each turn. Set your energy to 111 upon pickup and at the start of each Act.
relics.flavorText: Totally safe! Good for the environment! Fosters mutations!

relics.name: Sight of Future Skies
relics.description:
Replaces Sky's Mirror.
Whenever you play a card, put it on the bottom of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: You see it all laid out. One day the sky shall burn away.

relics.name: Star Eater
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, decrease the Stellar Phase by 2.
relics.flavorText: One by one, the stars in the sky wink out.

relics.name: Stone Buddy
relics.description: Every other turn, assists with a helpful effect.
relics.flavorText: He's gnot a gnelf.

relics.name: Superbombomb
relics.description:
At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP from radiation poisoning.
Right click: Destroy this relic and OBLITERATE all enemies.
relics.flavorText: A superweapon beyond any technology. Who made this...?

relics.name: Tangling Vine
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, take 3 damage.
relics.flavorText: Don't take this the wrong way.

relics.name: Broken Bowl
relics.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, if it isn't Upgraded, Upgrade it and lose 2 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: Sand drains from it endlessly.

relics.name: Dead Requiem
relics.description: Whenever you perform a bard:Melody, bard:Queue a random bard:Note.
relics.flavorText: Your toughest sheets.

relics.name: Ghostly Gear
relics.description: Whenever you play a πStrike or Defend, Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: The sword and shield are more difficult to see each time you look.

relics.name: Naga Cauldron
relics.description: All Potions you find are Entropic Brews.
relics.flavorText: Secretly the greatest playmaker ever to be concieved by mankind.

relics.name: Paid Education
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: That was just the down payment.

relics.name: Salvaging Tools
relics.description: Whenever you discard a card, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 this turn.
relics.flavorText: "Curious! These primitive things are utterly useless." -Ranwid

relics.name: Sextant
relics.description: You can see the contents of ? rooms.
relics.flavorText: Useful for sniping.

relics.name: Snail's Watch
relics.description: Whenever you play 12 cards in a single combat, end your turn and gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Someone is going to want this back.

relics.name: Trinoculars
relics.description: The maximum Stellar Phase is now 63.
relics.flavorText: Lets you see three times as many stars!

relics.name: Xtacy
relics.description: After you play a cost X card, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Sure to liven up your nights!

potions.name: Tweet Potion
potions.description: Deal 20 damage. @DBotling tweets about your run.
